overview: The Stooges, not faring well with their diner, enter Curly in a milking contest at the County Fair. But when they take him to a pasture to practice, Curly doesnt know a cow from a bull!
tagline: Busy America is never too busy to laugh!...And movie-goers have been laughing at filmdom's zaniest comedy team for ten years!
title: Busy Buddies
